title: Build a Crawler to Collect Data
snippet:
I need someone that is very experienced at building a web based crawler, collecting data and storing in Excel according to a specification.

In total, the script will need to crawl 4 pages that are all linked in sequence...eg:
- Main Page List
- Detail Page
- Specification Page 1 (from detail)
- Specification Page 2 (from detail)

This crawler will need to repeat about 2,000 times.
